title: Sri Lanka Colonial-Era Bungalow in the Kandapola Hills with Pool & Restaurant
description: Otherworldy scenery abounds at Goatfell, a majestic hideaway in Sri Lanka's lush tea country. This former colonial bungalow, now a boutique hotel, offers an unparalleled blend of vintage charm and misty vistas. Explore the surrounding verdant tea plantations, indulge in a traditional high tea or savour exquisite local cuisine at the onsite restaurant. Venture further to visit Nuwara Eliya, often referred to as 'Little England' and end your day with a sunset view from the hotel's panoramic terrace.
offer_address: Concordia Estate, Goatfell Bungalow, Kandapola 22220, Sri Lanka
